mapper.sql: /*[TbMetaCmpnyBasicSettingD.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT CMPNY_CD , SYS_CD , MULTI_DOMN_REFLCT_YN , KO_SCHMA_PERM_YN , ALPHA_RULE_CD , REGRT_EMPNO , REG_DY , US_YN , CRT_DTM , CRT_ID , MDF_DTM , MDF_ID FROM TB_META_CMPNY_BASIC_SETTING_D WHERE CMPNY_CD = #{cmpny_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SYS_CD = #{sys_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
